暦数: (れきすう) - calendar making; number of years; one's fate; the year
暦本: (れきほん) - books related to the calendar; the calendar; the almanac
暦注: (れきちゅう) - various information recorded in the almanac (as regards astronomy, astrology, etc.)
暦道: (れきどう) - study of the calendar; way of the calendar
暫く: (shibaraku) - por um momento, por um minuto; por um tempo, por algum tempo; por enquanto; faz muito tempo, quanto tempo
暫くして: (しばらくして) - after a short time; presently
暫くすると: (しばらくすると) - a short time later
暫くの間: (しばらくのあいだ) - for a short while; for a while; for some time; for the time being
暫く振り: (しばらくぶり) - long interval of time
暫し: (shibashi) - por um curto período, por pouco tempo, em breve, daqui a pouco
暫らく: (しばらく) - little while/short while/moment/instant; a while/quite a time; it's been a long time
暫且: (ざんしょ) - little while; short while
暫定内閣: (ざんていないかく) - caretaker government
暫定協定: (ざんていきょうてい) - provisional agreement
暫定措置: (ざんていそち) - temporary step; stopgap measure
暮し: (くらし) - (usu. ぐらし as a suffix) life; living; livelihood; life circumstances
暮し向き: (くらしむき) - circumstances; lifestyle; life circumstances
暮す: (くらす) - to live/to get along; to spend (time)
暮らし: (kurashi) - vida, viver, sustento, circunstâncias da vida
暮らしに響く: (くらしにひびく) - to affect the cost of living
暮らしぶり: (くらしぶり) - lifestyle; way of life
暮らしを詰める: (くらしをつめる) - to cut down housekeeping expenses
暮らし向き: (くらしむき) - circumstances; lifestyle; life circumstances
暮らし始める: (くらしはじめる) - to begin some form of lifestyle
暮らし振り: (くらしぶり) - lifestyle; way of life
暮れ: (kure) - pôr do sol, crepúsculo, anoitecer, entardecer; fim, encerramento, pôr do sol, crepúsculo, anoitecer, entardecer; fim, encerramento; fim de ano
暮れなずむ: (くれなずむ) - to grow dark slowly
暮れる: (くれる) - to get dark; to end/to come to an end/to close/to run out; to be sunk (e.g. in despair)/to be lost
暮れ六つ: (くれむつ) - Edo-period term for a time of day, roughly 6 pm
暮れ果てる: (くれはてる) - to fall completely dark
暮れ残る: (くれのこる) - to linger (faint light of twilight); to remain lit in the lingering twilight
暮れ泥む: (くれなずむ) - to grow dark slowly
暮れ行く: (くれゆく) - to darken; to wane
暮春: (ぼしゅん) - late spring; third month of the lunar calendar
暮果てる: (くれはてる) - The sun has set completely
暮秋: (ぼしゅう) - late autumn (fall); ninth month of the lunar calendar
暮色蒼然: (ぼしょくそうぜん) - (yoji) dusky; somber light of a gathering dusk
暮鐘: (ぼしょう) - twilight tolling of a bell
暴きだす: (あばきだす) - to dig up and expose a criminal matter
暴き出す: (あばきだす) - to dig up and expose a criminal matter
暴く: (あばく) - to disclose; to divulge; to expose
暴れだす: (あばれだす) - to grow restive; to begin to act violently
暴れっ子: (あばれっこ) - naughty child; fretful kid; raging child
暴れる: (あばれる) - to act violently; to rage; to struggle; to be riotous
暴れん坊: (あばれんぼう) - rambunctious kid/wild kid; hooligan/rowdy/roughneck/a rough
暴れ出す: (あばれだす) - to grow restive; to begin to act violently
暴れ回る: (あばれまわる) - to rampage; to run riot
暴れ川: (あばれがわ) - river which often overflows its banks
暴れ牛: (あばれうし) - restive bull (esp. in bull riding)
暴れ狂う: (あばれくるう) - to rage; to run amok (amuck); to tear around
暴れ込む: (あばれこむ) - to enter someone's territory by force
暴力に訴える: (ぼうりょくにうったえる) - to resort to violence
暴力シーン: (ぼうりょくシーン) - violent scene (in a movie, etc.)
暴力団: (ぼうりょくだん) - gangster organization (organisation); crime syndicate; yakuza (Japanese mafia); band of thugs; group of hoodlums
暴力団員: (ぼうりょくだんいん) - gangster; mobster; yakuza (member)
暴力団対策法: (ぼうりょくだんたいさくほう) - Anti-Organized Crime Law
暴力団抗争: (ぼうりょくだんこうそう) - gangland war
暴力団狩り: (ぼうりょくだんがり) - roundup of gangsters
暴力団組員: (ぼうりょくだんくみいん) - mobsters; gangsters
暴力手段: (ぼうりょくしゅだん) - (yoji) violent means
暴力沙汰: (ぼうりょくざた) - (yoji) (committing, resorting to) an act of violence
暴力行為: (ぼうりょくこうい) - act of violence; violent behavior
暴力革命: (ぼうりょくかくめい) - violent revolution
暴動: (ぼうどう) - insurrection; rebellion; revolt; riot; uprising
暴動を収める: (ぼうどうをおさめる) - to quell a disturbance
暴動を治める: (ぼうどうをおさめる) - to quell a disturbance
暴動鎮圧: (ぼうどうちんあつ) - riot control
暴噴: (ぼうふん) - blowout (oil well, gas field, etc.)
